Subjects: Christina, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Christina in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
the gentil virgine sancte cristineÞat god seruit vith hart
                    fyne…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þe fellone dioclysianeÞat cristine men slew mony
                    ane
